data.oai_dc:dc: (Table 1) Benthic foraminifera species observed in the Quaternary samples from DSDP Hole 95-612

95-612, Adercotryma glomerata, Ammobaculites agglutinans, Ammonia beccarii, Ammotium cassis, Astrononion gallowayi, Bolivina decussata, Bolivina subspinescens, Brizalina bradyi, Brizalina pseudopunctata, Brizalina spathulata, Brizalina subaenariensis, Buccella frigida, Bulimina aculeata, Bulimina exilis, Bulimina gibba, Bulimina marginata, Bulimina striata, Buliminella elegantissima, Cassidulina laevigata, Cassidulina reniforme, Chilostomella oolina, Cibicides lobatulus, Cibicides pseudoungerianus, Cibicidoides robertsonianus, Counting >63 µm fraction, Cribrostomoides canariensis, Cyclogyra involvens, Deep Sea Drilling Project, Dentalina ittai, Dentalina spp., Dentalina subemaciata, Dentalina subsoluta, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Discorbis cf. nitida, DRILL, Drilling/drill rig, DSDP, Eggerella advena, Elphidium excavatum forma clavata, Elphidium excavatum forma excavatum, Elphidium excavatum forma lidoe, Elphidium excavatum forma magna, Elphidium excavatum forma selseyensis, sp., Gyroidina soldanii, Haynesina depressula, Haynesina orbiculare, Heterohelix sp., Hoeglundina elegans, Hyperammina sp., Islandiella teretis, Karreriella bradyi, Lagena spp., Leg95, Lenticulina denticulifera, Lenticulina spp., Miliolinella subrotunda, Nodosaria sp., Nonion auriculata, Nonion barleeanum, Nonionella atlantica, Nonionella turgida, Nonionellina labradorica, Nonion sp., North
